com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.multi

Interface ServiceFactory


  • public interface ServiceFactory
    Callback object which constructs (or reconstructs) a service based on its name/id and context data. Used in conjunction with a ServiceStore to reconstruct active services following a restart of the scheduler process. Context data is provided by the developer, and may contain e.g. configuration info for the service. Context data is limited to 100KB (100 * 1024 bytes).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AbstractScheduler buildService(byte[] context)
      Returns a constructed service in the form of an AbstractScheduler.

    • Method Detail

      • buildService

        AbstractScheduler buildService(byte[] context)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns a constructed service in the form of an AbstractScheduler. It should parse any application-specific information from the provided context and use that information to build the AbstractScheduler using a SchedulerBuilder. An implementation of this interface must be provided by the developer.
        Parameters:
        context - nullable context data for the service, as originally passed to ServiceStore.put(byte[])
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if (re)constructing the service failed, for example if the context could not be parsed
